summary: One-page website for an NGO named 'Archak Seva'.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Green bubble-text wordmark reading 'ARCHAK' on a transparent/white background, matching the uploaded IMG_5709.jpeg style (logo.dim_300x120.png)

existing_features.title: Create a single-page website for the NGO 'Archak Seva' with the following sections: Hero (organization name, tagline, and call-to-action button), About Us (mission and vision), Our Work/Programs (key initiatives or programs), Impact (statistics or achievements), Get Involved (volunteer/donate section), and Contact (address, email, phone, and a simple contact form).

Apply a warm, earthy visual theme — using colors like deep saffron, terracotta, cream/off-white, and forest green — with clean serif/sans-serif typography pairing to evoke trust, community, and service. Enforce this design system consistently across all sections including buttons, headings, backgrounds, and icons.

Generate and display a hero banner image and a logo/emblem image for Archak Seva, rendered as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated. Use the hero image as the full-width background of the Hero section and the logo in the navigation bar.

Replace the existing generated logo/emblem in the Navigation bar and Footer with the user-provided 'ARCHAK' logo image. Save the uploaded image as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/logo.dim_300x120.png and update the src references in Navigation.tsx and Footer.tsx to point to this new file.

new_feature_requests.summary: One-page NGO website for Archak Seva
Update/replace the logo with a user-provided image
